channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed

item.title: Si vous voyez ce message dans WhatsApp sur Windows 11, ce n’est pas une bonne nouvelle
item.description: Les utilisateurs de l'application WhatsApp pour Windows 11 reçoivent en ce moment un message annonçant quelque chose dont beaucoup se seraient bien passés.

item.description: Microsoft simplifie grandement l'utilisation de son tableur Excel par l'introduction d'une fonctionnalité très intéressante sur le papier.

item.title: Ce laptop gaming sous RTX 5060 + Ryzen AI 5 est 450 € moins cher pendant la période de Noël
item.description: Avis aux gamers confirmés à la recherche d'un PC portable puissant taillé pour les parties nerveuses cet hiver : le HP Victus 15-fb3012nf, un modèle qui embarque le récent GPU RTX 5060, est proposé à 849,99 euros au lieu de 1 299,99 euros sur Cdiscount.

item.title: Vibe Coding: convenience, risk and the future of software development
item.description: Vibe coding can open programming to a wider audience, build tech literacy and eliminate repetitive work. But it also comes with significant risks.

item.title: World Cup soccer fans are accusing FIFA of ‘monumental betrayal.’ Here’s why
item.description: Ticket prices for this summer’s matches have begun to circulate and fans are not happy. Soccer fans have accused FIFA of a “monumental betrayal” after latest prices for World Cup tickets began to circulate on Thursday.The governing body allocates 8% of tickets to national associations for games involving their team to sell to the most loyal fans.And a list published by the German soccer federation revealed prices ranged from $180-$700 for varying group stage games. The lowest price for the final was $4,185 and the highest was $8,680.Those group-stage prices are very different from FIFA’s clai...

item.title: Russia threatens to block all Google services in a 'soft squeeze' of US tech
item.description: Russia is considering a complete ban on Google services, according to a member of the State Duma's IT committee. This comes as part of a wider crackdown on foreign technology.

item.title: Zevo wants to add robotaxis to its car-share fleet, starting with newcomer Tensor
item.description: As robotaxi adoption continues, wild ideas like personal ownership and renting them out are starting to pop up again.

item.title: Why the flash crisis will last much longer this time

item.title: Here’s how Hinge is surviving the dating app apocalypse
item.description: Nobody wants to swipe anymore. Dating apps like Bumble and Tinder are scrambling to keep younger users engaged, and dealing with problems like bots on their platforms. But one brand is breaking the pattern and winning. Hinge’s “designed to be deleted” tagline signals its strategy: focus on meaningful connection, not endless swiping. The app can […] Nobody wants to swipe anymore. Dating apps like Bumble and Tinder are scrambling to keep younger users engaged, and dealing with problems like bots on their platforms. But one brand is breaking the pattern and winning....

item.title: Cette voiture électrique chinoise vendue en Europe veut supprimer l’angoisse du créneau avec cette technologie qui nous laisse perplexe
item.description: Le constructeur chinois Geely vient de dévoiler une technologie pour le moins spectaculaire : un système de roues directrices indépendantes permettant à sa voiture électrique vendue en Europe, l'EX5, de pivoter sur place. Un prototype a été présenté, mais les contraintes existent.

item.title: 18,000 Amtrak workers will get bonuses, thanks to executive cuts
item.description: Unions representing train workers praised the move. More than 18,000 Amtrak workers will receive a $900 bonus before the end of the year, the U.S. Department of Transportation announced on Thursday evening.Funding for the bonuses will come from Amtrak’s executive leadership team bonus packages, the statement said. The federal administration urged executive leadership “to forgo 50% of the bonus packages that would have been paid out under the misplaced priorities of the previous executive bonus structure.”Amtrak set all-time records for both ridership and revenue in the 2025 fiscal year, accord...

item.title: Reddit sues Australia over underage social media ban
item.description: Reddit has filed a lawsuit in Australia's High Court aiming to overturn the country's under-16 social media ban, Reuters reported. The forum platform called the law contrary to Australia's constitution as it intrudes on free political discourse. It also argued that Reddit shouldn't have been included in the ban since it isn't a social media site, based on the law's definition. The action is likely to set in motion a protracted legal battle, given Reddit's resources and its popularity in Australia Australia's minimum age social media ban, the first of its kind in the world, went into effect on ...

item.title: How to vibe-write a country hit
item.description: You may not even know it, but you've almost certainly encountered songs made mostly or even entirely with AI. If you've scrolled on TikTok the last few weeks, you've probably heard "I Run" a few times, but there are countless others making their way around social and music platforms. AI tools in general, and Suno […]

item.title: The Apple Watch Series 11 is $100 off and cheaper than ever
item.description:
If you're still on the hunt for gifts, or simply good holiday deals for yourself, you can find them on the internet. Just because Black Friday and Cyber Monday have ended doesn't mean the deals have dried up. One of the best deals available that we're tracking is on the latest Apple Watch Series 11, which you can get for a record low of $299.
We gave the Apple Watch Series 11 a score of 90 when it came out in September. That's thanks, in part, to an upgraded 24 hours of battery life — which lasted closer to a day and a half — compared to the 18 hours promised by the Series 10. It also featu...

item.title: A presidential refresher on wireless terminology, courtesy of Trump Mobile

As usual, we're still waiting for a response. In the meantime, we're publishing a little reminder of some wireless tech terms. You know, in case you forgot. 6G? 4K? 3D? […]

item.title: Lululemon stock price gets a boost as CEO departs and buybacks rise. Is this the start of a turnaround?
item.description: After a rough year, the athleisure apparel brand just reported higher revenue and a leadership shakeup that appears to have investors pleased. Lululemon might just be entering a new—and improved—era.

item.title: Reddit argues it isn’t like other social platforms in case against Australia’s social media ban
item.description: Reddit, one of the world's largest social platforms, is arguing that it doesn't meet the definition of "social media platforms" as it seeks to overturn Australia's law banning children under 16 years of age from social media.

item.description: Cannibal horror to a kid-friendly monster movie — with Mads Mikkelsen as a hitman! "Dust Bunny" is now in theaters. Plus, a "Pushing Daisies" Season 3 update!

item.description: .TWII is up 22% this year to date in line with Nasdaq, but it has a better P/E ratio, easing fears of an AI bubble.

item.description: A new Star Wars game set during the Old Republic era is now in development at Arcnaut Studios from Knights of the Old Republic and Mass Effect trilogy director Casey Hudson.

item.title: Shein, Temu, AliExpress : les petits colis seront taxés de 3 euros en entrant dans l’Union européenne
item.description: À compter du 1er juillet prochain, les colis de faible valeur provenant de l’extérieur des frontières de l’Union européenne subiront un droit de douane de 3 euros. Les plateformes chinoises de commerce en ligne sont les premières visées.

item.title: This Tetris-playing watch struggles with the one thing it should be great at
item.description: The Tetris: My Play Watch may look like an Apple Watch, but it eschews most of the functionality you'll typically find on a smartwatch to focus on two things: playing Tetris and celebrating the game through a UI that's thoroughly Tetris-themed. It's very good at making you want to play Alexey Pajitnov's iconic tetromino-stacking puzzler, […]

item.title: F1: The Movie now streaming on Apple TV following a long theatrical run
item.description: F1: The Movie, the cinematic love letter to Formula One and — quite possibly even more so — consumer products made by Apple, is finally available to stream on Apple TV if you’re a subscriber. It follows the sports thriller’s long theatrical run, during which it raked in more than $630 million globally, comfortably making it Apple’s most successful original film. Directed by Joseph Kosinski (Top Gun: Maverick, Tron: Legacy), F1: The Movie follows the washed-up former F1 prodigy Sonny Hayes (Brad Pitt), who is convinced by an old friend (Javier Bardem) to get back in the driver's seat and help r...

item.title: Measles outbreak in South Carolina comes as infections nationwide are already at their highest since 1992
item.description: With vaccination rates declining, new preliminary data from the CDC shows that 2025 is the worst year for measles cases in more than three decades. Measles infections in America have hit their highest numbers in 33 years. In 2025, cases have topped 1,900, and that number is expected to rise due to an ongoing outbreak in South Carolina.

item.title: Best Merino Wool T-Shirts (2025), Tried On and Tested
item.description: These merino wool T-shirts are the last shirt you’ll ever wear. I’m wearing one right now.

item.title: In 2025, AI and EVs gave the US an insatiable hunger for power
item.description: You may be surprised to learn electricity only accounts for 21 percent of the world’s energy consumption. Fossil fuels and the rest all play their part to make the world go around, but their role is likely to diminish no matter what happens. The International Energy Agency believes electricity’s share of global energy consumption is going to double in the next decade alone. You all know the causes: Electrification, EVs, data centers and AI mean the planet needs to dramatically increase its power generation, transmission and storage capacity. It’s a shame, then, that the world is nowhere near r...

item.title: If you’re fed up with data breaches, this new technology could finally help
item.description: It’s called zero-knowledge proof technology, and here’s how it works. Every few weeks, Americans get another letter in the mail that starts the same way: “We’re writing to inform you that your personal data has been exposed.” A retailer gets hacked. A hospital. A supermarket. A travel site. It never ends. Most of us feel like we’ve lost control over who has our information and how it’s being used. But a new kind of privacy technology, one that lets companies confirm what they need to know without ever seeing your personal details, may finally offer a way out of this mess....

item.title: Samsung Galaxy Buds 3 Pro : de 249 € à 95 € seulement, ces excellents écouteurs notés 9/10 sont le super deal du jour
item.description: Les Galaxy Buds 3 Pro de Samsung offrent une excellente prestation digne des meilleurs écouteurs du marché. Si ces derniers vous intéressent, c'est le bon moment de craquer : ils sont en promotion à 95 euros contre 249 euros de base.
